blur_detection.description: The receipt shows clear, crisp text with well-defined characters and good edge definition throughout the document.
blur_detection.recommendation: No action needed as the image has excellent sharpness for OCR processing.

contrast_assessment.description: The receipt displays excellent black text against a white/cream background with strong contrast for optimal readability.
contrast_assessment.recommendation: No improvement needed as the contrast is ideal for text extraction.

glare_identification.description: No visible glare, reflections or overexposed areas are present on the receipt surface.
glare_identification.recommendation: Current lighting conditions are ideal; maintain similar lighting for future document captures.

water_stains.description: No water damage, discoloration or staining is visible on the receipt.
water_stains.recommendation: Continue to keep receipts dry and protected from liquids.

tears_or_folds.description: The receipt shows minor creasing or light fold marks but all text remains fully legible.
tears_or_folds.recommendation: For optimal results, store receipts flat or use a document flattener before scanning.

cut_off_detection.description: The receipt is fully captured within the frame with all edges and content visible.
cut_off_detection.recommendation: Current framing is excellent; maintain similar positioning for future document captures.

missing_sections.description: The receipt appears complete with header, line items, totals, and footer information all present.
missing_sections.recommendation: No action needed as all standard receipt sections are clearly visible.

obstructions.description: No fingers, shadows or objects obstruct the receipt content; the background pattern is separate from the receipt.
obstructions.recommendation: Continue using a contrasting background that doesn't interfere with the receipt content.
